description:
Cities: Skylines 2 - A Future Worth Building Together

Cities: Skylines 2 is the long-awaited sequel to the award winning city building game Cities: Skylines from Paradox Interactive. The original Cities: Skylines revolutionized city sims by offering unparalleled sandbox gameplay and creative tools that gave players the freedom to build the city of their dreams. Cities: Skylines 2 promises to build on this legacy with even more possibilities and innovations to construct the cities of the future.

Some key things we know about Cities: Skylines 2 so far:

• Improved graphics and simulation - The sequel will have significantly improved graphics, simulation, and pathfinding capabilities to model more realistic cities.

• New building types - Players will be able to construct futuristic buildings, transportation systems, and more to create truly unique cities of the future.

• Region gameplay - Cities will no longer be isolated, but part of a larger region with neighboring towns that players can manage and influence.

• Natural disasters - For the first time, players will have to deal with natural disasters that strike their cities and test their urban planning skills.

• Multiplayer - Paradox has hinted at multiplayer capabilities in Cities: Skylines 2 that will allow players to cooperate and compete with friends.

We don't know an official release date yet for Cities: Skylines 2 but it is in development at Paradox Interactive. The developers have stated that they are working to create "a future worth building together" and that Cities: Skylines 2 will "change the game".

When it is released, Cities: Skylines 2 promises to push the boundaries of simulation city builders and build upon what made the original so successful.
name: cities skylines 2
